text: 43:2 Esekiel 10:3-4; 10:18-19; 11:22-23; Akar Mogomem 1:15Ezɨ kɨ garima, Israelian Godɨn angazangarir ekiam ko gavgavim aruem anadi naghɨn ikegha izi. Ezɨ angazangarir ekiam ko gavgavim izir dughiamɨn, kɨ nɨgɨnir ekiam barazima, a mati ongarir ekiaba dɨpɨra tɨngazi. Ezɨ Godɨn angazangarim nguazim gamima a bar dafogha taghtasi.
